name: Hold A to Drift
description:
HOW TO PLAY

  • Keyboard keys:

WASD --> Drive

Space --> Drift

  • Controller keys:

LD or RT --> Drive

A --> Drift


A Brainwash Gang game made for the Ludum Dare 47:

ORIGINAL MUSIC BY Bea "Beícoli" (@beibeicoli)

Fernando Labarta (@RaferLabarta)

Edu Verz (@verz_edu)

Quike Zárraga (@quike_z)

Sergio Alcelay (@VincentBini)
